## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b4be65c523eb787fd770a0043ac2da7671984be4864bdb74108eb0e7b3007611)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'src_dev-tool_index_ts' @ 6.5.8 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
